programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -odac ;;;realtime audio out ;-iadc ;;;uncomment -iadc if realtime audio input is needed too ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ;-o flanger.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 ksmps = 32 nchnls = 2 0dbfs = 1
instr 1
kfeedback = p4 asnd vco2 .2, 50 adel linseg 0, p3*.5, 0.02, p3*.5, 0 ;max delay time =20ms aflg flanger asnd, adel, kfeedback asig clip aflg, 1, 1 outs asig+asnd, asig+asnd ;mix flanger with original
endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 10 .2 i 1 11 10 .8 ;lot of feedback e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
